file.name: authentication-info.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  title: Eclipse Kapua REST API - Authentication
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: Eclipse Kapua Dev Team
    url: https://eclipse.org/kapua
    email: kapua-dev@eclipse.org
  license:
    name: Eclipse Public License 2.0
    url: https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

paths:
  /authentication/info:
    get:
      description: Returns all the Authentication and Authorization informations about the current session
      tags:
        - Authentication
      summary: Login Info
      operationId: authenticationLoginInfo
      responses:
        200:
          description: An object conatining all the Authentication and Authorization informations about the current session
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './authentication.yaml#/components/schemas/loginInfo'
        401:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/unauthenticated'
        500:
          $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/kapuaError'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: paths: /authentication/info: get: operation "authenticationLoginInfo": responses: 500: resolve "../openapi.yaml#/components/responses/kapuaError" reference: invalid response reference
